Articles.Content:
Imagine another typical start of your new rocket....

Bill Bob and Jeb

the rocket run out of fuel and fall down like a stone

Bill and bob scream and Jeb laughs WTF??? he is going to die (I have forgotten the parachute :-[) and he laughs ????

So my Challenge is to ignore my bad English ( ;D), and make Jeb scream.

Bronze Award:

7 secounds of Pain and Scream

Silver Award:

10 Secounds of Pain and Scream

Gold Award:

20 Secounds of Pain and Scream

THE ULTIMATIVE AWARD:

30 Secounds of Pain and Scream

Rules:

1. I want a video (camcorder videos count too)

2. Jeb mustn\'t die

3. I know my english isn\'t very good, accept it

Much fun with this challenge

I\'ve got a video with 49 seconds of Jeb freaking out, could probably make it go longer if I tried.

Will upload the video when I get a chance to edit it.
OK - as promised - details on how to make him freak out, and keep him freaking out.
I postulate that its not the explosions, but that you are wasting good boosters.

Not bad guys, so i will make ONE harder challenge for you...

start an rocket without Bill is screaming (Bob is impossible,but you can try it.. ;P)

oO(I will make a harder Challenge for the KSP-Community next time...)

Not bad guys, so i will make ONE harder challenge for you...

start an rocket without Bill is screaming (Bob is impossible,but you can try it.. ;P)

oO(I will make a harder Challenge for the KSP-Community next time...)

A very very slow take off followed with a slow ascent.
2:14 here, and I never leave the pad!
